mean_en: of or relating to the time during the early Stone Age when people made rough tools and weapons out of stone
word_etyma: paleo古，旧+lith石头+ic形容词后缀，…的→旧石器时代的
short_phrase: a caveman from the Paleolithic era
sentence: During the Paleolithic era, most tools were made of stone.
sentence_trans: 在旧石器时代，许多工具都是由石头制成的。
